results.deck: A Japanese video game development company.
results.description:
Overview

From Software is a Japan-based developer, founded in 1986, that develops games for a multitude of platforms. They are best known for their Armored Core franchise and have released 14 titles to date. Other games developed by From Software include the Tenchu series, Chromehounds, Lost Kingdoms, Enchanted Arms, Otogi, and the Souls series.
